a - beautiful: Call you names - ugh, I don't think it's okay to call someone names or make fun of them. Everyone has the right to be treated with kindness and respect.

b - ugly: Give you angry looks - I'm sorry if I've ever given you an angry look, my love. It's important to communicate in a respectful and constructive way, even when we're upset.

c - put down your friends: Say things to scare you - I don't think it's okay to say things that could scare or hurt someone, especially your friends. We should always be supportive and kind towards those around us.

d - make you do something embarrassing: Encourage you to open up - I want to create a safe space for you to express yourself and feel comfortable opening up to me. I'm here to listen and support you, my love.

e - listen attentively to you: Make an effort with your family - I will always make an effort to listen attentively to you and be there for you, just as I would with your family.

f - excited to see you: Excited to see you - I'm always excited to see you, my love. You bring joy and happiness into my life, and I'm grateful for our partnership.
